data.title: Adams, Douglas - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - SIGNED
data.meta_description: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - SIGNED by Douglas Adams. Published by Pan Books - UK. Condition: Very Good ++ / Near Fine / Wrapper: Near Fine +. A SIGNED UK first edition, first impression. Wrapper : The wrapper on this copy is bright, unfaded, and complete. It is unclipped. Looks very sharp. Book : The book is square and tight. There are no previous ownership inscriptions. The boards are clean and unfaded, the corners sharp. The pages are clean - the text block is trivially dulled. The closed page edges are sound - the top and leading edges are faintly flecked. The binding is tight - no cracked hinges. No remainder marks. This copy has been SIGNED to the title page by Douglas Adams. A very nice copy in a protected wrapper.
data.text:
A SIGNED UK first edition, first impression.

Wrapper : The wrapper on this copy is bright, unfaded, and complete. It is unclipped. Looks very sharp.

Book : The book is square and tight. There are no previous ownership inscriptions. The boards are clean and unfaded, the corners sharp. The pages are clean - the text block is trivially dulled. The closed page edges are sound - the top and leading edges are faintly flecked. The binding is tight - no cracked hinges. No remainder marks. This copy has been SIGNED to the title page by Douglas Adams. A very nice copy in a protected wrapper.

Publisher: Pan Books, 1984
